content:
This code chunk defines default callback options for user-defined actions during button press events in a dial/valuator widget, allowing customization of behavior on interaction while maintaining a clean and flexible interface design.

('postCallback',    None,           None),
            # Extra data to be passed to callback function, needs to be a list
            ('callbackData',    [],             None),
        )
        self.defineoptions(kw, optiondefs)
